title: Easter 'egg' biscuits
ingredients: ['For the biscuits', '100g quark or Greek yoghurt', '2 tablespoons milk', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 pinch salt', '170g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', 'For filling and decorating', '1/2 (370g) jar apricot jam, strained through a fine sieve', 'icing sugar']
